class.name: motor
class.description: a class that allows access to spike prime motors
class.required imports:
import motor 
 from hub import port

parameter.name: Port
parameter.description: Port of spike prime to which motor is connected

parameter.name: Degrees
parameter.description: Degrees for which the motor should turn.

parameter.name: Speed
parameter.description: Speed at which the motor should run in degrees per second.

class.name: color_sensor
class.description: a class that allows access to spike prime color sensors
class.required imports:
from hub import color_sensor 
 from hub import port

parameter.name: Port
parameter.description: Port of spike prime to which color sensor is connected

returns.name: the color sensed by the color sensor

parameter.name: Port
parameter.description: Port of spike prime to which color sensor is connected

returns.name: the intensity of light sensed by the color sensor

class.name: motor_pair
class.description: a class that allows controlling two spike prime motors together
class.required imports:
import motor_pair 
 from hub import port

parameter.name: motor pair
parameter.description: Specification of which motor pair to move

parameter.name: degrees
parameter.description: Degrees for which the motor pair should turn.

parameter.name: steering
parameter.description: How much the motor pair should alter motor speeds to turn

parameter.name: velocity
parameter.description: Speed at which the motors should run in degrees per second.

parameter.name: motor Pair
parameter.description: Specification of which motor pair to move

parameter.name: time
parameter.description: Duration for which motors should turn in milliseconds (1000 = 1 second)

parameter.name: steering
parameter.description: How much the motor pair should alter motor speeds to turn

parameter.name: velocity
parameter.description: Speed at which the motors should run in degrees per second.

class.name: distance_sensor
class.description: a class that allows access to spike prime distance sensors
class.required imports:
from hub import distance_sensor 
 from hub import port

parameter.name: Port
parameter.description: Port of spike prime to which distance sensor is connected

returns.name: the distance measured by the sensor in millimeters. If the distance sensor cannot read a valid distance it will return -1

class.name: motion_sensor
class.description: a class that allows access to spike prime motion sensors
class.required imports:
from hub import motion_sensor 
 from hub import port

returns.name: a tuple containing x, y & z acceleration values as integers. The values are mili G, so 1 / 1000 G
a tuple containing yaw pitch and roll values as integers. Values are decidegrees
a tuple containing x, y & z angular velocity values as integers. The values are decidegrees per second

class.name: sound
class.description: a class that enables control of built in SPIKE Prime speakers
class.required imports:
from hub import sound 
 from hub import port

function.name: beep
function.syntax: sound.beep(freq: int = 440, duration: int = 500, volume: int = 100)
